QuestData.Title: We Must Construct Additional Pylons
QuestData.Description: We came here to retrieve a reserve pylon to power Auchindoun's defenses, but we've been pinned to this position by the Shadow Council for hours!$B$BI need to get these injured back to Exarch's Refuge, but we still need the backup system!$B$BPlease, gather Arkonite crystals and an Arkonite pylon from the tomb and meet me at the refuge as quickly as you can!
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect $1oa Arkonite Crystals and an Arkonite Pylon from the Tomb of Lights.
QuestData.CompletionText: Do you have the arkonite pylon and the crystals?
QuestData.RewardText: Light bless you, hero! We need to hold out as long as we can so Nyami can track down the remaining power shards. This pylon will help take the load off of our soulpriests.
